sentences.en: ...after suffering the heartache of her divorce from her first husband.
sentences.cn: …经历了与第一任丈夫离婚的心痛之后。

sentences.en: A happy heart makes the face cheerful, but heartache crushes the spirit.
sentences.cn: 13心中喜乐, 面带笑容.心里忧愁,灵被损伤.

sentences.en: Allow your intuition ( or spirit ) to save you from heartache.
sentences.cn: 用你的直觉让你免于心痛.

sentences.en: Blood red burns my eyes, Xieshui cold Qigu, the endless heartache.
sentences.cn: 血红色灼伤了我的眼, 血水冰冷刺骨, 又是无尽的心痛.

sentences.en: Every time she came home late, she caused him heartache.
sentences.cn: 每次她晚归, 他都很伤心.

sentences.en: He got over the heartache of breaking up with his girlfriend.
sentences.cn: 他慢慢地从跟女朋友分手的心痛中恢复.

sentences.en: He tumbler, Diezuo to the ground, heartache, such as crack.
sentences.cn: 他抱着不倒翁,跌坐在地, 心痛如裂.

sentences.en: Heartache comes with having children as it does with being alive.
sentences.cn: 有孩子就会有伤心;就如同活着就会有伤心一样.

sentences.en: I forgot the heartache which makes up the rest of the price.
sentences.cn: 我不应该忘记,补偿价钱的不足部分用的是心痛.

sentences.en: I was spared their heartache only because I had the funds.
sentences.cn: 我鼓励他们坚持度过自己的低状况,直到有机会接收听析.

sentences.en: Millions of people are suffering from undeserved stress, trials, problems and heartache.
sentences.cn: 超过百万人沈溺在痛苦 、 尝试 、 问题与心伤之中.

sentences.en: Secret affairs can only lead to heartache and emotional consumption.
sentences.cn: 否则只能是头疼的事情和感情的浪费.

sentences.en: Secret affairs will only lead to heartache.
sentences.cn: 白羊座:秘密的私情只能导致心痛.

sentences.en: The old man had a sudden attack of heartache.
sentences.cn: 这位老人突然心脏病发作.

sentences.en: The relationship caused her a great deal of heartache.
sentences.cn: 这段恋情使她非常伤心。

sentences.en: There will still be days of struggle and heartache.
sentences.cn: 仍然会有奋斗的日子,心痛的时刻.

trans.tran_en: a strong feeling of great sadness and anxiety
